hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I create digital experiences by combining the beauty of the front end with the robustness of the back end. Let's build something amazing together.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm a full-stack developer who loves blending creativity and code. I've been curious since I was a kid and always enjoyed making art — today I use that mix to build digital experiences that help people. I work on AI integrations to make interfaces more natural, practical, and comfortable. I treat design and development as one: creating beautiful, useful solutions. I simply love what I do.
education_items: Systems Analysis and Development at Unifecaf 2022-2024

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: A showcase of my capabilities across the stack.

gamy.title: Gamy - Virtual Assistant for Games
gamy.description: Gamy is a nerdy and fun virtual assistant specialized in everything about games. Whether to search for news, tips, recommendations or curiosities from the gaming universe, Gamy is always ready to help!

mikaeru.title: Mikaeru - 2D Platform Game
mikaeru.description: A 2D platform game developed with Unity and C#, featuring mechanics like double jump, basic AI enemies, and visual effects with parallax. It has 6 levels with different challenges.

opuscheck.title: Opus Check - To-Do List App
opuscheck.description: Opus Check is a web application for listing daily tasks!

webscraping.title: Web Scraping - Data Extraction Bot
webscraping.description: Data extraction robot from Magazine Luiza.

rick-and-morty-api.title: Rick and Morty API App
rick-and-morty-api.description: A simple web application that uses the Rick and Morty API to display character information.

youtube-api.title: Simple YouTube with API
youtube-api.description: Simple YouTube using an API created by me.

projeto-sass-css.title: Calmaria Spa Landing Page
projeto-sass-css.description: Landing page built with SASS in CSS!

minecraft-best-mods.title: Minecraft Best Mods
minecraft-best-mods.description: A site focused on responsiveness using the MobileFirst technique.

ping-pong.title: Ping Pong Game
ping-pong.description: In this game your goal is to hit the ball and not let the opponent score points!

atravessando-a-rua.title: Crossing the Street
atravessando-a-rua.description: In this game your goal is to cross the street.. but watch out for the cars!

contact.title: Let's Talk?
contact.description: I’m always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
